testcase.title: 001)Check Chinese locale is displayed on Event Transcript for localization

steps.title: I logged in as a "Localization" user with access to "CE-4" project

substeps.message: New Home page logged in  properly and Locale Icon is Displayed

steps.title: the "HomePage" page should be loaded on log on with Locale Dropdown
I verify "Chinese" language should listed under the Locale Dropdown and Select check-box against Chinese

substeps.message: Index Search Linked Clicked User clicked on the Index Search Link

steps.title: I perform Quick Search by term "cancer"
I click on EventTranscript dataset in the result page
I click on "random" report link from the results table
I click on the snapshot link in event transcript

substeps.message: Event Transcript Report pageLoaded Properly With Chinese Text

steps.title: I Verify Chinese lang for "EventTranscript" page

substeps.message: On 'EventTranscript' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'snapshot.title' with the key 'snapshot.title' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?? and the Content displayed on UI SNAPSHOT are NOT matching

On 'EventTranscript' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'snapshot.providedby' with the key 'snapshot.providedby' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ????? Thomson Reuters ?? and the Content displayed on UI Event Transcripts are provided by Thomson Reuters are NOT matching

On 'EventTranscript' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'snapshot.name' with the key 'snapshot.name' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?? and the Content displayed on UI Name are NOT matching

On 'EventTranscript' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'snapshot.company' with the key 'snapshot.company' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?? and the Content displayed on UI Company are NOT matching

On 'EventTranscript' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'snapshot.date' with the key 'snapshot.date' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?? and the Content displayed on UI Date are NOT matching

On 'EventTranscript' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'snapshot.speakers' with the key 'snapshot.speakers' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ??? and the Content displayed on UI Speakers are NOT matching

On 'EventTranscript' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'snapshot.drug' with the key 'snapshot.drug' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?? and the Content displayed on UI Drug are NOT matching

steps.title: I Verify the Chinese lang for "EventTranscript" report
